## Definition

Given (fully observed) \\(\mathbf{Y} \in\Re^{N\times M} \geq 0\\)

Find \\(\mathbf{U} \in\Re^{N\times L} \geq 0 \\) and \\(\mathbf{V} \in\Re^{M\times L} \geq 0\\)

that minimize \\(||\mathbf{Y} - \mathbf{U}\mathbf{V}^{T}|| _2\\)

### Algorithm (Lee and Seung, 2001)

Multiplicative update rules:

\\(u_{n,l} = u_{n,l} \frac{(\mathbf{Y}\mathbf{V})_{n,l}}{(\mathbf{Y}\mathbf{Y}^{T}\mathbf{U})_{n,l}} \\)

\\(v_{m,l} = v_{m,l} \frac{(\mathbf{Y}^T\mathbf{U})_{m,l}}{(\mathbf{Y}^{T}\mathbf{Y}\mathbf{V})_{m,l}} \\)

Related to the additive SGD updates

### NMF with KL divergence

Assume that \\(\mathbf{Y}\\) represents a probability distribution \\((\sum_{n,m} y_{n,m} = 1)\\)

Minimizing the Kullback-Leibler divergence:

\\( KL_{div}(\mathbf{Y}||\mathbf{U}\mathbf{V}^{T}) = \sum_{n,m}(y_{n,m}\log\frac{y_{n,m}}{(\mathbf{U}\mathbf{V}^{T})_{n,m}} )  \\)

- results in similar multiplicative updates
- ensures that \\(\mathbf{U}\\) and \\(\mathbf{V}\\) also represent probability distributions

### Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis/Indexing

KL-NMF optimizes the same objective as pLSA/I (Gaussier and Goutte, 2005):

\\(y_{n,m} = (P(n,m) = \sum_l P(l) P(m|l) P(n|l) = u^\prime_{n,l} v^\prime_{l,m} \\)

where \\(n\\) is a document and \\(m\\) a word.

 \\( \mathbf{Y} \approx \mathbf{U}\mathbf{V}^{T} = (\mathbf{U}\mathbf{A}^{-1}\mathbf{A})(\mathbf{V}\mathbf{B}^{-1}\mathbf{B})^T = (\mathbf{U}\mathbf{A}^{-1})(\mathbf{A}\mathbf{B})(\mathbf{V}\mathbf{B}^{-1})^T\\)

where \\(\mathbf{A}\\) and \\(\mathbf{B} \in\Re^{L\times L} \\) are identity matrices with \\(a_{l,l} = \sum_n v_{n,l}\\) and \\(b_{l,l} = \sum_m u_{m,l}\\)
